name: Disable or Delete Windows Eventlog
description: Detects command that is used to disable or delete Windows eventlog via logman Windows utility
false_positives: Installer tools that disable services, e.g. before log collection agent installation
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*logman\ * AND process.command_line:(*stop\ * OR *delete\ *) AND process.command_line:*EventLog\-System*)`
